greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of 0's in n-th row of triangle in A070950.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: steps = 100; Count[#, 0]& /@ MapIndexed[ Take[#1, {steps - First[#2] + 2, steps + First[#2]}]&, CellularAutomaton[30, {{1}, 0}, steps]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 07 2013 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 19 2002
